work_experience.title: Data Scientist
work_experience.description: Developed and deployed multiple Python services with FASTAPI & FLASK frameworks. Managed Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, and user analytics to enable efficient data tracking and dashboarding. Extended the support to feature research, developing service architectures. Created numerous ETL pipelines and MLDL models to fulfill various business requirements.

Managed Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, User Analytics, UIUX design, User Onboarding. Created & implemented architecture for dynamic model loading.
